channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These 10 Horror Movies From The 1980s Are Too Silly To Take Seriously
item.description: The 1980s were rife with horror movies far too silly to be taken seriously, whether due to their unabashedly silly premises or their absurd execution.

item.title: Which Hunger Games Did Wiress Win & How?
item.description: Sunrise on the Reaping reveals more about Wiress’ Hunger Games tournament, and her win shares a similarity to Haymitch’s during the Quarter Quell.

item.title: 10 Horrific MCU Moments That Were Almost So Much Worse
item.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe is full of horrifying or tragic moments that almost were terrible for very different reasons, only to be changed.
